articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: General Election 2017: Labour to rip up Tory Brexit plan
articles.description: The party says it would prioritise jobs and workers' rights, and guarantee the status of EU citizens.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US submarine arrives in South Korea as tensions rise
articles.description: It comes amid worries of a North Korean missile test as Pyongyang marks its army's anniversary.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: France elections: Le Pen steps aside as National Front leader
articles.description: Marine Le Pen says she will be above "partisan considerations" as she seeks the French presidency.
